COMMITTEE ON COMMERCE
May 10, 1967
Mr. Jerrold Sandler
Executive Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington, D.C.20036
Dear Mr. Sandler:
My appreciation for calling attention
to the reference made in the May 6th issue
of The New Republic to our Educational Radio
and Television Measure.
The reprint of the article is most
appreciated.
WGM.d
